title: Understanding React State
description: Learn how to manage state in your React applications.

content.data: State in React is used to hold data that can change over time.

title: Using Context API
description: Explore the Context API to manage global state in your application.

content.data: The Context API allows you to pass data through the component tree without having to pass props down manually at every level.

title: HTML Basics
description: Learn about HTML structure and essential tags.

content.data: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard markup language for creating web pages.
